file.name: positive3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                foo:
                  value:
                    versions:
                      - status: CURRENT
                        updated: "2011-01-21T11:33:21Z"
                        id: v2.0
                        links:
                          - href: http://127.0.0.1:8774/v2/
                            rel: self
components:
  schemas:
    GeneralError:
      type: object
      items:
        type: string
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string
      required:
        - name

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: at 1:42: schemas: "GeneralError": parse schema: object cannot contain 'items' field
